mapper.select: select id, eplId, eplName, triggerState, triggerTime, status, opinion, dealTime, fundid, orgid, orgname, textState, eplDescribe, thresholds, startTime, endTime from ( select tr.id, tr.epl_id eplId, tr.epl_name eplName, tr.trigger_state triggerState, tr.trigger_time triggerTime, tr.end_time endTime, tr.start_time startTime, tr.status, tr.opinion, tr.deal_time dealTime, tr.fundid, tj.orgid, tj.orgname, tt.text_state textState, tt.epl_describe eplDescribe, tt.thresholds from rtc_rule_trigger_record tr join ( select e.epl_id, e.text_state,e.epl_describe,concat(group_concat(concat(t.threshold_name, '=', t.threshold_value))) thresholds from rtc_epl e left join rtc_threshold t on (e.epl_id=t.epl_id) group by e.text_state,e.epl_id,e.epl_describe ) tt on(tr.epl_id=tt.epl_id) left join ( select tc.custid, tc.orgid, tg.orgname from customer tc, org tg where tc.orgid=tg.orgid ) tj on (tr.fundid=tj.custid) where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) ttt

select a.triggerDate, a.processed, a.ignored, a.unprocessed, a.processing, a.processed, a.total, (case when b.processed is null or b.processed=0 then a.processed else a.processed-b.processed end) processedAdd, (case when b.ignored is null or b.ignored=0 then a.ignored else a.ignored-b.ignored end) ignoredAdd, (case when b.unprocessed is null or b.unprocessed=0 then a.unprocessed else a.unprocessed-b.unprocessed end) unprocessedAdd, (case when b.processing is null or b.processing=0 then a.processing else (a.processing-b.processing)*100 end) processingAdd, (case when b.total is null or b.total=0 then a.total else a.total-b.total end) totalAdd, (case when b.processed is null or b.processed=0 then 100 else (a.processed-b.processed)*100/b.processed end) processedPre, (case when b.ignored is null or b.ignored=0 then 100 else (a.ignored-b.ignored)*100/b.ignored end) ignoredPre, (case when b.unprocessed is null or b.unprocessed=0 then 100 else (a.unprocessed-b.unprocessed)*100/b.unprocessed end) unprocessedPre, (case when b.processing is null or b.processing=0 then 100 else (a.processing-b.processing)*100/b.processing end) processingPre, (case when b.total is null or b.total=0 then 100 else (a.total-b.total)*100/b.total end) totalPre from ( select
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
triggerDate, sum(case when status=1 then 1 else 0 end) processed, sum(case when status=2 then 1 else 0 end) ignored, sum(case when status=3 then 1 else 0 end) unprocessed, sum(case when status=4 then 1 else 0 end) processing, count(1) total from rtc_rule_trigger_record WHERE 1=1
and trigger_time <= CAST((CAST(now()AS DATE) + INTERVAL 1 DAY)AS DATETIME) and trigger_time >= CAST(CAST(now()AS DATE)AS DATETIME) group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
and trigger_time <= now() and trigger_time >= str_to_date(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),'00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
and trigger_time <= now() and trigger_time >= str_to_date(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:'),'00'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
) a left join ( select
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
triggerDate, sum(case when status=1 then 1 else 0 end) processed, sum(case when status=2 then 1 else 0 end) ignored, sum(case when status=3 then 1 else 0 end) unprocessed, sum(case when status=4 then 1 else 0 end) processing, count(1) total from rtc_rule_trigger_record WHERE 1=1
and trigger_time < CAST(CAST(now() AS DATE)AS DATETIME) and trigger_time >= CAST((CAST(now()AS DATE) + INTERVAL -1 DAY)AS DATETIME) group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d') order by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d') desc
and trigger_time < str_to_date(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),'00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and trigger_time >= CAST((str_to_date(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),'00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') + INTERVAL -2 HOUR)AS DATETIME) group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H') order by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H') desc
and trigger_time < str_to_date(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:'),'00'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and trigger_time >= CAST((str_to_date(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:'),'00'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') + INTERVAL -2 MINUTE)AS DATETIME) group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') order by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') desc
) b on 1=1 order by triggerDate desc limit 1

select
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
triggerDate, sum(case when status=1 then 1 else 0 end) processed, sum(case when status=2 then 1 else 0 end) ignored, sum(case when status=3 then 1 else 0 end) unprocessed, sum(case when status=4 then 1 else 0 end) processing, count(1) total from rtc_rule_trigger_record WHERE 1=1
and trigger_time <= str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and trigger_time >= str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
and trigger_time <= str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and trigger_time >= str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H') group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
and trigger_time <= str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and trigger_time >= str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')

select
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
triggerDate, sum(case when status=1 then 1 else 0 end) processed, sum(case when status=2 then 1 else 0 end) ignored, sum(case when status=3 then 1 else 0 end) unprocessed, sum(case when status=4 then 1 else 0 end) processing, count(1) total from rtc_rule_trigger_record WHERE 1=1
and trigger_time < str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and trigger_time >= CAST((str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL -1 DAY) AS DATETIME) group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d') order by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d') desc
and trigger_time < str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H') and trigger_time >= CAST((str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H') + INTERVAL -1 HOUR)AS DATETIME) group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H') order by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H') desc
and trigger_time < str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and trigger_time >= CAST((str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') + INTERVAL -1 MINUTE)AS DATETIME) group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') order by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') desc

select
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
triggerDate, sum(case when status=1 then 1 else 0 end) processed, sum(case when status=2 then 1 else 0 end) ignored, sum(case when status=3 then 1 else 0 end) unprocessed, sum(case when status=4 then 1 else 0 end) processing, count(1) total from rtc_rule_trigger_record where 1=1
and trigger_time <= str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and trigger_time >= str_to_date(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
and trigger_time <= str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and trigger_time >= str_to_date(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
and trigger_time <= str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and trigger_time >= str_to_date(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') group by date_format(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')

select id, eplId, eplName, triggerState, triggerTime, status, opinion, dealTime, fundid, orgid, orgname, textState, eplDescribe, thresholds, startTime, endTime from ( select tr.id, tr.epl_id eplId, tr.epl_name eplName, tr.trigger_state triggerState, tr.trigger_time triggerTime, substring(tr.end_time, 0, 19) endTime, substring(tr.start_time, 0, 19) startTime, tr.status, tr.opinion, tr.deal_time dealTime, tr.fundid, tj.orgid, tj.orgname, tt.text_state textState, tt.epl_describe eplDescribe, tt.thresholds from rtc_rule_trigger_record tr join ( select e.epl_id, e.text_state,e.epl_describe,concat(group_concat(concat(t.threshold_name, '=', t.threshold_value))) thresholds from rtc_epl e left join rtc_threshold t on (e.epl_id=t.epl_id) group by e.text_state,e.epl_id,e.epl_describe ) tt on(tr.epl_id=tt.epl_id) left join ( select tc.custid, tc.orgid, tg.orgname from customer tc, org tg where tc.orgid=tg.orgid ) tj on (tr.fundid=tj.custid) where tr.status = 3
and tr.trigger_time >= str_to_date(#{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and tr.trigger_time <= str_to_date(#{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
order by tr.trigger_time desc limit 10 ) ttt

select sum(case when status=1 then 1 else 0 end) processed, sum(case when status=2 then 1 else 0 end) ignored, sum(case when status=3 then 1 else 0 end) unprocessed, sum(case when status=4 then 1 else 0 end) processing, count(1) total from rtc_rule_trigger_record where 1=1
and trigger_time >= str_to_date(#{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and trigger_time <= str_to_date(#{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')

select count(*) count, epl_id eplId, epl_name eplName from rtc_rule_trigger_record where status = 3
and trigger_time >= str_to_date(#{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and trigger_time <= str_to_date(#{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
group by epl_id, epl_name
